It is the capital of the Marga Marga Province. It is part of the Greater Valparaíso metropolitan area. According to the 2017 census, 151,708 people lived there. The city was founded in 1898. == References == == Other websites == * Municipality of Quilpué Category:Cities in Chile Category:Valparaíso Region Category:1898 establishments Category:1890s establishments in South America Category:19th-century establishments in Chile
